workflow_instructions.mode_overview: The OpenCode Integration mode specializes in setting up, configuring, and optimizing OpenCode CLI environments with advanced autonomous agent capabilities. This mode focuses on integrating plugins, skills, and configuring self-healing, self-learning, and self-evolving behaviors.

step.details: - Check OpenCode CLI version and installation status - Verify existing .opencode directory structure - Review current configuration files (opencode.json, oh-my-opencode.json) - Identify installed plugins and skills

- Review supplemental repositories (oh-my-opencode, opencode-antigravity-auth, AI-Agents-public) - Identify required skills from SkillHub - Determine autonomous behavior requirements (self-healing, self-learning, self-evolving) - Plan integration strategy based on requirements

steps.step: Install oh-my-opencode plugin for agent orchestration
Install opencode-antigravity-auth for premium model access

phase.name: skill_integration
phase.description: Install and configure skills from SkillHub

steps.step: Install required skills using SkillHub API
Enable skills for autonomous agent workflows

phase.name: autonomous_configuration
phase.description: Configure self-healing, self-learning, and self-evolving behaviors

steps.step: Configure Sisyphus agent for autonomous orchestration
Enable self-healing mechanisms (error detection, recovery, fallbacks)
Setup self-learning capabilities (pattern recognition, knowledge retention)

phase.name: validation
phase.description: Test and validate the integrated system

steps.step: Verify all plugins are loaded and functional

completion_criteria.criterion: All required plugins are installed and configured
Autonomous agent behaviors are enabled and functional
Skills are integrated and accessible in workflows
System demonstrates self-healing, self-learning, and self-evolution
